Document.description: A little bit about me, my contact information, and my public GPG key.
Document.body:
About

Hello, I am Lucy Robillard. I am a silly little genderfae transbian trying to make her way in the world. I am currently serving as an AmeriCorps Member at City Year where I serve as a near-peer mentor and tutor in a 3rd grade classroom, providing extra support, hosting small groups, and planning and executing school-wide events and bulletin boards in an undeserved community in Sacramento, California. I got my undergrad in computer science from the University of California, Davis in 2025, and I earned an Associate in Science for Transfer in Mathematics and an Associate of Science in Natural Science from Sierra College in 2022. I enjoy programming and computer science and you will find some of my projects on this website. I am a musician and have been playing trumpet since 2011, and I am currently playing trumpet in the Video Game Orchestra at UC Davis.

Contact

You can contact me via email: larobitrumpet@lucyrobillard.xyz

If you have a ProtonMail account and want to use that, you can email: larobitrumpet@protonmail.com

My GitHub can be found here: github.com/larobitrumpet

My public GPG key can be found here: GPG key.

You can run this command to automatically download my GPG key and add it to your keyring:

curl -L https://lucyrobillard.xyz/pubkey.txt | gpg --import
